thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com | 6 of 135
thread.title: Kevin
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Kevin

author: Kevin
title: Kevin
text: We appreciated that we were allowed to shop in the store in peace without being constantly bothered by clerks. We made a decision. Checkout was relatively fast and were happy with the negotiated price. They provided a delivery day at the time of purchase, which didn't change. We got a delivery window and on-line tracking of the delivery. The delivery people arrived and delivered within the provided window. They were friendly and careful with the delivery.
